content: The USCDI says that allergy groups should be represented in C-CDA with SNOMED Drug Classes from this value set 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1114.14. It is supposed to be a sub set of the Substance Reactant for Intolerance value set (2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1010.1) but it isn't. How are other vendors handling this issue? Thanks!
You might want to ask this on #CDA. Most CDA folks don't hang out on this stream (because the volume of CDA vs. FHIR is too low).
